featured.text: Global sales of hard hats totaled USD 2.1 billion in 2016, and are expected to reach USD 3.19 billion in 2025. 39.
Posters of the local rock band were displayed in store windows to promote the sale of their _____ tickets.
It is predicted that driverless cars will be ready for sale within five years.
Since Michael was the best candidate, the committee voted for him to take charge of the company’s sales department.

other.text: The manager must try to find out who is really ________ for this serious sales problem.
According to the passage, which of the following statements is true about the hard hat? (A) Global sales have doubled every ten years.
Sales of rap music and videos each exceed that amount.
How much money do sales of rap music and videos together make each year?
The recent cooking oil scandals have led to calls for tougher ______ of sales of food products.

definition.zh_def: 銷售，出售商品或服務的行為或過程。
definition.en_def: The exchange of goods or services for money; the act of selling.
definition.example: The store is having a big sale this weekend.
